summary: Couple custom tattoos I made for my character
descriptionHtml:
Since I have yet to spend any time learning CK, I can\'t quite release any \"real\" mods, but here\'s a little something I made for couple of my outfit mods.



Installation:

Download, extract, select ONE of the options, backup original, and replace original.


Don\'t worry about the relatively small size of the body texture file, I used DXT5 for compression, and the quality is comparable to the much larger uncompressed ARGB.





Uninstallation:

Remove femalebody_1.dds, restore original.




=====================


See included images for preview.
author: Elewin
